actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to direct a study and report by the secretary of transportation of a proposed interstate highway from Kansas City to Baton Rouge through the state of Arkansas.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to study and report by January 1, 1974, a proposed interstate highway from Kansas City to Baton Rouge through the State of Arkansas.

titles.title: A bill to direct a study and report by the secretary of transportation of a proposed interstate highway from Kansas City to Baton Rouge through the state of Arkansas.
